name: SharePhotoContentParams
summary: Parameters to pass to the the presentPhotoShareDialog method.

properties.name: mode
properties.summary: The mode to select for presenting a share dialog.
properties.description: The automatic mode will progressively check the availability of different modes and open the most appropriate mode for the dialog that is available.

properties.name: photos
properties.summary: An array of photos that is represented by an object of photo, caption and userGenerated parameters.
